meanings.definition: A male horse that has not been gelded.
meanings.sent1: The stallions galloped gracefully in the field.
meanings.sent2: The farmer owned a beautiful stallion that won many races.
meanings.sent3: The stallions seemed to be having a serious discussion about the best grazing spots.
meanings.sent4: The power and strength of the stallions reminded me of ancient warriors.
meanings.sent5: The majestic stallions with flowing manes were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A group of male horses kept for breeding purposes.
meanings.sent1: The ranch had a stable full of stallions ready for mating season.
meanings.sent2: The stallions were carefully selected for their strong genes.
meanings.sent3: The stallions organized a race to determine the leader of the group.
meanings.sent4: The herd of stallions stood together like a united brotherhood.
meanings.sent5: The valuable stallions were the pride of the farm.
